item.title: How to Keep Your MAC Always Awake
item.description: Here are some common scenarios: You’re about to step away from your Mac for a period, or you’re downloading large files and want to keep your Mac from going to sleep. (If you use an external display, you likely understand what I mean. Sometimes, after waking from sleep mode, your Mac fails to power on the external display.) That’s why I highly recommend Amphetamine to you. I’ve often heard that macOS boasts excellent power management, but lacking in-depth knowledge myself, I’ve sought out the answer.
